Class DBSCharacter

java.lang.Object
  DBSCharacter
Direct Known Subclasses:
DBSPlayableCharacter, DBSSummonCharacter
public class DBSCharacter
extends java.lang.Object

This is the class that does most of the work in the Dagora Battle System. It's intended to be a superclass for any type of character needed.

Version:
0.1 Java
Author:
Evan Hildreth (root -1 Entertainment)

Field Summary
static int Num_Abilities
          Max number of abilities able to learn
static int Num_Attacks
          Maximum number of attacks possible for the character
static int Num_Weapons
          Max number of weapons able to equip
static double Rush_Ratio
          When HP/MaxHP is less than this, char enters Adrenaline mode
static int XP_Lv
          Number of XP to rise to next level; current level is multiplied by this
